Package camzup.core

Class ParserSvg

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.ParserSvg
public abstract class ParserSvg extends Object
A scalable vector graphics (SVG) parser class. SVG parsing is at best very minimal. Use only for basic or simplified SVG files, not ones that contain CSS styling (color and materials will not be evaluated anyways) or non-standard XML nodes (including nodes generated by Inkscape and/or Adobe Illustrator).
